name: Guide (Niven Hedinger)
description:
Guide is a short, first person horror game with intriguing concept of the underworld job title - "Guide". What are the requirements to apply? What is the job even about? 
To answer these questions, you got to experience the one and only, unique simulation. 

The game was made under 1 week. Most of the assets are premade, with the addition of unique sound effects, which were made by me and little creepy score. I deeply appreciate the support of my followers and every one else, who motivates me to make this type of games. Although, I must say this game has some requirements. 

WARNING! 
The game contains flashing lights and super loud sound effects, so be aware. 

GAMEPLAY!
Use W, A, S, D keys to move, mouse to look around and LMB to interact. 

THANKS FOR CHECKING OUT THE GAME.
